settings.about_banner_text: Onoglams Lingerie was established for stylish ladies that have sophisticated dreams of their inner self

settings.about_text: We recognised a need in the lingerie industry for full bust lingerie at an affordable price range, and created perfection in our collections.
settings.about_text_two:
Onoglams Lingerie prides itself as a repute online store to provide extensive beautiful, high-quality ready to wear lingerie for customer around the world.

We offer a perfect size inclusive design for stylish woman of all ages and plus size. Our design are feminine to provides extra support, comfort and fit, with wide range of different types of bra, including plunge bras, full cup bras, T-shirt bras, strapless bras, half cup bras, bralettes bras, nursing bra, sport bras and wireless bras made with soft fabrics with attention to details and fit. Available in 32-40 band sizes, A to K cup sizes and S-3XL.

Onoglams offers nightwear collections that include both long and short styles, they are comfortable and soft against the body and also glamorous.
